category: Sports Instructor Qualification Committee Regulations/Article 13 (Exclusion, Avoidance, Avoidance)
contents: Article 13 (Exclusion, Avoidance, Avoidance) ① If a committee member falls under any of the following, he or she will be excluded from performing his or her duties. 1. If the member himself or herself is a candidate for the relevant qualification test. 2. If the member is a relative of the applicant for the relevant qualification test (referring to a relative under Article 777 of the Civil Act). ② The candidate for the qualification test expects fair deliberation from the committee members. If there are difficult circumstances, a request for recusal can be submitted to the committee, and the committee decides to recusal when it deems the request for recusal to be valid. ③ If a committee member knows that a matter falls within the circumstances of paragraph 1 or determines that it falls under the grounds of paragraph 2, he or she must voluntarily withdraw from the deliberation.
